item.title: Louis Galloway @ Elite London
item.dc:creator: stevenchu
item.description:
Absolutely amazing to shoot– it always catches you a bit off guard when you realize there’s something special there and you keep clicking as if it will peel away the layers of mystery. […]

The post Louis Galloway @ Elite London appeared first on Steven Chu Event Photos.
item.content:encoded:
Absolutely amazing to shoot– it always catches you a bit off guard when you realize there’s something special there and you keep clicking as if it will peel away the layers of mystery. Shooting Louis reminds me of when Roy Pratt first walked into my studio for a portrait session (a few years ago now!) and he had arrived in New York just a week and a half earlier, yet there was something absofuckinlutely special there. Look at Roy now, there’s the proof that others were seeing the same thing.

I sincerely wish the best success to Louis, and I hope the industry treats him well!

(A quick note: these New York Class of Fall 2011 photos for TheFashionisto.com have zero retouching. These are the boys.)

Please include credits when reposting:

Fusion model Louis Galloway
Photography: Steven Chu (https://stevenchu.com/)
Client: TheFashionisto.com
Styling: Carl Barnett (http://thefashionisto.com/)
Grooming/Makeup: Georgi Sandev (http://georgisandev.com/)
Blazer by Diwon Man with shirt by Hyden Yoo

http://thefashionisto.com/new-york-class-of-fall-2011-louis-galloway-by-steven-chu/

 

Buffer

The post Louis Galloway @ Elite London appeared first on Steven Chu Event Photos.

item.title: The Fashionisto: New York Class of Fall 2011 Casting Call by Steven Chu
item.dc:creator: stevenchu
item.description:
This past Saturday Carl & I set out to do our 2nd New York Fashion Week Casting Call. I *loved* many of the guys that came by and at times couldn’t stop clicking […]

The post The Fashionisto: New York Class of Fall 2011 Casting Call by Steven Chu appeared first on Steven Chu Event Photos.
item.content:encoded:
This past Saturday Carl & I set out to do our 2nd New York Fashion Week Casting Call. I *loved* many of the guys that came by and at times couldn’t stop clicking (as if clicking would dig away and uncover the mysterious allure to some, and I would have an answer).

New York Class of Fall 2011 | Exclusive Casting Call by Steven Chu

Below is a teaser for each of the individual posts to come. Check on thefashionisto.com or perhaps on this link to see the updates http://thefashionisto.com/casting-call/new-york-fall-2011/

Left to Right: Arthur Sales (Soul), Paul Boche (Fusion), Michael Elmquist (DNA), Francis Lane (Root), Alec Foster (Red), Leebo Freeman (ADAM).

This past Saturday, we hosted a day of faces, both new and established for a class photo of sorts. Donning a double breasted blazer from Diwon Man and a modest shirt from Hyden Yoo, the models each sat for a brief session with Steven Chu before making a dash to castings for the upcoming fashion week.

Over the course of fashion week, we’ll provide a closer look at this season’s class as each model reveals their secret for surviving an endless amount of castings.

Left to Right: Joseph Turnbull (Fusion), Lowell Tautchin (Soul), Chris Galya (Soul), Andres Risso (Request), Sebastian Sauve (Soul), Loammi Goetghebeur (New York).

Left to Right: Randy Lebeau (Fusion), Bastien Bonizec (Q), Gabriel Perez (New York), Daniel Hamaj (Request), Evan Spight (ADAM), Nico Krull (Red).

Left to Right: Eric Ramos (Request), Marcel Pawlas (Colby), Louis Galloway (Fusion), Jarrod Destiche (Root), Shane Gambill (ADAM), Brett White (Colby).

Photography: Steven Chu
Styling: Carl Barnett / The Fashionisto
Makeup: Georgi Sandev
Hair: Georgi Sandev / Mesh Subra

Special thanks to all the agencies who graciously sent out their boys.
arthur sales, bastien bonizec, carl barnett, casting call, daniel hamaj, eric ramos, fall 2011, loammi goetghebeur, lowell tautchin, michael elmquist, new york fall 2011, new york fashion week, nico krull, paul boche, randy lebeau, sebastian sauve, shane gambill, steven chu

Buffer

The post The Fashionisto: New York Class of Fall 2011 Casting Call by Steven Chu appeared first on Steven Chu Event Photos.

item.title: East Village Boys – Boy of the Week: Erik Bergrin
item.dc:creator: stevenchu
item.description:
This week’s East Village Boy of the Week is Erik, from New York Photographed for EVB by Steven Chu http://www.eastvillageboys.com/2010/09/19/boy-of-the-week-62/ I first came across Erik’s work in the form of an iceberg sculpture […]

The post East Village Boys – Boy of the Week: Erik Bergrin appeared first on Steven Chu Event Photos.
item.content:encoded:
This week’s East Village Boy of the Week is Erik, from New York
Photographed for EVB by Steven Chu
http://www.eastvillageboys.com/2010/09/19/boy-of-the-week-62/

I first came across Erik’s work in the form of an iceberg sculpture ‘hat’, complete with polar bears (I forget if they were drowning) that somebody wore during this year’s gay pride. Of course, Erik’s design abilities go well beyond that. For our shoot, we showcased him with his work in an adventure deep into the waters of Brooklyn’s Prospect Park. As dusk fell, we encountered overly friendly park employees, as well as overly friendly mosquitoes ready for their evening meal. – Steven Chu


Buffer

The post East Village Boys – Boy of the Week: Erik Bergrin appeared first on Steven Chu Event Photos.
